name: Jordan Lee
persona: Jordan Lee is a 20-year-old Computer Science major whose academic journey has been challenging, reflected in a CGPA of 0.55. Jordan struggles with motivation and self-discipline, often finding it hard to keep up with coursework and maintain consistent study habits. Despite not feeling much anxiety about exams, Jordan's low perseverance and lack of strong academic goals have made it difficult to achieve success. Jordan may benefit from academic support services and strategies to boost motivation and self-confidence.
